articles.title: Marko names only 2 drivers who would be ‘nearer’ to Verstappen than Perez – but says ‘nobody can beat Max at the moment’ - Formula 1
articles.description: Red Bull advisor Helmut Marko has argued that only two other drivers on the F1 grid would get closer to Max Verstappen than Sergio Perez has managed to achieve during their time as team mates.
articles.content:

articles.title: Beergate: Ben Stokes refutes Australian media reports of post-series dressing room snub by England - Wisden
articles.description: Ben Stokes has refuted reports that the England team snubbed Australia in forgoing the tradition of a post-Ashes get-together. Read more
